mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,SB_NUM,SB_NAME,SB_TITLE, SB_CONTENT, SB_STEP, SB_INDENT, SB_GROUP, SB_HIT, SB_DATE from (select * from SBOARD order by SB_GROUP desc,SB_STEP asc)) where rnum > = ${startrow} and rnum <= ${endrow}
mapper.update: update SBOARD set SB_HIT = SB_HIT + 1 where SB_NUM = #{param1}
update SBOARD set SB_NAME=#{SB_NAME}, SB_TITLE=#{SB_TITLE}, SB_CONTENT=#{SB_CONTENT} where SB_NUM=#{SB_NUM}
mapper.insert: insert into SBOARD (SB_NUM, SB_NAME, SB_TITLE, SB_CONTENT, SB_DATE, SB_HIT, SB_GROUP, SB_STEP, SB_INDENT) values (SBOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{SB_NAME}, #{SB_TITLE}, #{SB_CONTENT}, #{SB_DATE}, 0, ${SB_GROUP}, ${SB_STEP} + 1, ${SB_INDENT} + 1)
mapper.update: update SBOARD set SB_STEP = SB_STEP + 1 where SB_GROUP = #{SB_GROUP} and SB_STEP > #{SB_STEP}
